parameters.description: Filter schedules ending before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

communicationConsent.description: Consent for communication according to LGPD

serviceHandled.description: List of service IDs handled by the Professional

duration.description: Duration of the Service in hours (represents the time the Service takes)

price.description: Price of the Service in R$

acceptsInsurance.description: Indicates if the Service is covered by insurance

nextContactDays.description: Number of days until the next contact (e.g., if the next contact is in 30 days, enter 30)

repeatUntil.description: Date until which the schedule repeats
Date until which the schedule repeats

seriesId.description: Unique identifier for the series of recurring events

startTime.description: Start time of the schedule in HH:mm format

endTime.description: End time of the schedule in HH:mm format

excludeId.description: Appointment ID to exclude from check

totalIn.description: Total amount of money received (accounts receivable)

totalOut.description: Total amount of money paid (accounts payable)
